text: I am super into savory breakfast and at
this time of year I love to just take
the bounty of the garden while in my
case the farmer's market and just slap
it on a piece of toast and eat it so
today it's tomatoes and ricotta on toast
with basil some of my favorite summer
ingredients slice up your tomatoes any
tomatoes will do but these golden
heirloom tomatoes are fantastic take
some ricotta cheese the best ricotta you
can find I love a fresh ricotta in a
pinch regular old ricotta will do though
use a nice whole grain toast or a rustic
bread something that you really can sink
your teeth into spread the cheese over
your toes bleurgh tomatoes that's the
way to do it a little bit of fresh basil
in the summer is pretty much my go-to or
for almost anything breakfast included
if you had a little bit of pesto you
could put a little layer of pesto
underneath that ricotta that would be
sublime or mix some pesto into the
ricotta try that mmm salt pepper
and a drizzle of oil tada super excited
to eat this for breakfast or lunch or
even dinner but why not start your day
right and make this ricotta and tomato
toast mmm toast
is there anything it can't do
you
